title: Hippo For Christmas
description: Hapless ex-con Eddie Spurlock's only success in life is a brilliant nine year old daughter named Ellie, but the clever girl wants nothing to do with him. And now, through a hastily entered bet, he must get her the most impossible gift for Christmas, or risk being canceled from her life forever.Hippo For Christmas is a charming and funny tale; a perfect story to be read by the entire family or by anyone who is attempting to get into the holiday spirit. It will remind you of what Christmas is really about.Be the first to read this beloved Christmas Classic!
author: C.J. Carrington
